text:
The HTML code generated by "mod_autoindex" does not
validate. See

http://validator.w3.org/check?url=http://www.sslug.dk/misc/download/

for an example.
creator: sparre@nbi.dk

text: The first attachment was a patch for mod_autoindex in Apache 1.3.22.
creator: sparre@nbi.dk

text:
Yes, it's a known issue. In 2.0 and later, tables can be enabled by configuration.
1.3 will stick with the <pre> stuff, also because of backwards compat, sorry.

Thanks for using Apache!
creator: nd@perlig.de

text: *** Bug 17800 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
creator: nd@perlig.de
